trans-unit.source: Provides properties, methods, and events related to the current application.
trans-unit.target: 提供屬性、 方法和目前的應用程式的相關事件。

trans-unit.source: The properties exposed by the `My.Application` object return data that is associated only with the current application or DLL.
trans-unit.target: 所公開的屬性`My.Application`物件只與目前的應用程式或 DLL 相關聯的傳回資料。

trans-unit.source: No system-level information can be altered with `My.Application`.
trans-unit.target: 任何系統層級資訊可以修改為`My.Application`。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application` object consists of the following classes: - <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase> provides members that are available in all projects.
trans-unit.target: `My.Application`物件組成下列類別:-<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase>提供適用於所有專案的成員。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase>

trans-unit.source: - WindowsFormsApplicationBase provides members that are available in Windows Forms applications.
trans-unit.target: -WindowsFormsApplicationBase 提供可用在 Windows Form 應用程式中的成員。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase> provides members that are available in console applications.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase>提供主控台應用程式中可用的成員。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase"></xref> class with the specified authentication mode.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase"></xref>與指定的驗證模式的類別。

trans-unit.source: If the `authenticationMode` parameter is the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationMode> enumeration value, then this constructor attempts to set the current thread's <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> property to the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal> for the current user.
trans-unit.target: 如果`authenticationMode`參數是<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationMode>列舉值，則這個建構函式會嘗試設定目前的執行緒<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>屬性<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal>目前的使用者。</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationMode>

trans-unit.source: If the `authenticationMode` parameter is the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationMode> enumeration value, then this constructor leaves the current thread's <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> property unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果`authenticationMode`參數是<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationMode>列舉值，則這個建構函式會保留目前的執行緒<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>屬性保持不變。</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationMode>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationMode"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the application's authentication mode.
trans-unit.target: 指定應用程式的驗證模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext"></xref> object for the current thread of a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext"></xref>目前執行緒的 Windows Forms 應用程式的物件。

trans-unit.source: This is an advanced member; it does not appear in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab.
trans-unit.target: 這是進階的成員;它不會出現在 IntelliSense 中除非您按一下**所有** 索引標籤。

trans-unit.target: 專案類型的可用性 | | | |-|-| |專案類型 |可用 | |Windows Form 應用程式 |**Yes**| |類別庫 |否 | |主控台應用程式 |否 | |Windows Form 控制項程式庫 |否 | |Web 控制項程式庫 |否 | |Windows 服務 |否 | |網站 |否 |

trans-unit.source: This property returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext"></xref> object for the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext"></xref>目前執行緒的物件。

trans-unit.source: That object contains contextual information about the thread.
trans-unit.target: 該物件包含有關執行緒的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Processes all Windows messages currently in the message queue.
trans-unit.target: 處理目前在訊息佇列中的所有 Windows 訊息。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.DoEvents` method allows your application to handle other events that might be raised while you code runs.
trans-unit.target: `My.Application.DoEvents`方法可讓您的應用程式來處理您的程式碼執行時所引發的其他事件。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.DoEvents` method has the same behavior as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: `My.Application.DoEvents`方法具有相同的行為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you run a Windows Forms application, it creates a new form, which then waits for events to be handled.
trans-unit.target: 當您執行的 Windows Form 應用程式時，它會建立新的表單，然後等候處理的事件。

trans-unit.source: Each time the form handles an event, such as a button click, it processes all the code associated with that event.
trans-unit.target: 每次表單處理事件，例如按一下按鈕，它會處理與該事件相關聯的所有程式碼。

trans-unit.source: All other events wait in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 在佇列中等候所有其他事件。

trans-unit.source: While your code handles the event, your application does not respond.
trans-unit.target: 當您的程式碼處理事件時，您的應用程式沒有回應。

trans-unit.source: For example, the window does not repaint if another window is dragged on top.
trans-unit.target: 例如，視窗不會重新繪製如果拖曳至另一個視窗頂端。

trans-unit.source: If you call `My.Application.DoEvents` in your code, your application can handle the other events.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫`My.Application.DoEvents`程式碼，在您的應用程式可以處理其他事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if your code adds data to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> in a loop, and after each step of the loop it calls `My.Application.DoEvents`, your form repaints when another window is dragged over it.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您的程式碼將資料加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>在迴圈中，並在它會呼叫的迴圈的每個步驟之後`My.Application.DoEvents`，透過它拖曳至另一個視窗時，會重新繪製您的表單</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If you remove `My.Application.DoEvents` from your code, your form will not repaint until the click event handler of the button is finished executing.
trans-unit.target: 如果您移除`My.Application.DoEvents`從程式碼中，您的表單將不重新繪製按鈕的 click 事件處理常式完成之前執行。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you use this method in a loop to process messages.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您可以使用這個方法來處理訊息迴圈中。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `My.Application.DoEvents` method does not process events in exactly the same way as the form does.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`My.Application.DoEvents`方法不會處理事件中完全相同的方式與表單。

trans-unit.source: Use multithreading to make the form directly handle the events.
trans-unit.target: 使用多執行緒進行直接處理事件的形式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Multithreaded Applications](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[多執行緒應用程式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > If a method that handles a user interface (UI) event calls the `My.Application.DoEvents` method, the method might be re-entered before it finishes.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 處理使用者介面 (UI) 事件的方法如果呼叫`My.Application.DoEvents`方法，此方法可能是重新輸入之前完成。

trans-unit.source: This can happen because the `My.Application.DoEvents` method processes Windows messages, and Windows messages can raise events.
trans-unit.target: 這可能是因為`My.Application.DoEvents`方法處理 Windows 訊息和 Windows 訊息可以引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Application.DoEvents` method.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的工作，包含範例`My.Application.DoEvents`方法。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this application will use the Windows XP styles for windows, controls, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 決定此應用程式會使用 Windows XP 樣式的視窗、 控制項和等等。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnInitialize%2A> method uses this property to determine whether to call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnInitialize%2A>方法會使用這個屬性，以判斷是否要呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnInitialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether this application will use the XP Windows styles for windows, controls, and so on.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出此應用程式是否將使用 XP Windows 樣式的視窗、 控制項和等等。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Hides the application's splash screen.
trans-unit.target: 隱藏應用程式的啟動顯示畫面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase> class creates the splash screen on a separate thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase>類別會建立另一個執行緒上的啟動顯示畫面。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase>

trans-unit.source: This method marshals the call to the correct thread.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法封送處理至正確的執行緒呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the main form is done loading.
trans-unit.target: 完成主要表單時，會呼叫這個方法載入。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this application is a single-instance application.
trans-unit.target: 判斷此應用程式是否為單一執行個體的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Run%2A> method uses this property to determine whether this application is a single-instance application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Run%2A>方法使用這個屬性來判斷此應用程式是否為單一執行個體的應用程式。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Run%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether this application is a single-instance application.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出此應用程式是否為單一執行個體的應用程式。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the main form for this application.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此應用程式的主要表單。

trans-unit.source: Use the `MainForm` property to get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> object that the Visual Basic Application Startup/Shutdown model uses as the application's main form.
trans-unit.target: 使用`MainForm`屬性來取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>Visual Basic 應用程式啟動/關機模型用做應用程式的主要表單的物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: This property supports the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] Application Startup/Shutdown model.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性支援[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]應用程式啟動/關機模型。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The changes to this property are not persisted when the application closes.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式關閉時，不會保存此屬性的變更。

trans-unit.source: To change the main form permanently, you must change the setting in the **Project Designer**.
trans-unit.target: 若要永久變更，主要表單，您必須變更中的設定**專案設計工具**。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the main form for this application.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此應用程式的主要表單。

trans-unit.source: Determines the minimum length of time, in milliseconds, for which the splash screen is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 決定時間 （毫秒），啟動顯示畫面會顯示的最小長度。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` property allows you to specify the minimum length of time you want the application's splash screen to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime`屬性可讓您指定您想要顯示的應用程式的啟動顯示畫面時間的最小長度。

trans-unit.source: If the main form finishes initializing in less time than what is specified by this property, the splash screen remains until the requested amount of time passes, at which time the main form is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果主要表單完成初始設定的較少的時間比這個屬性所指定的內容，啟動顯示畫面會一直要求的時間為止，此時會顯示主要表單的數量。

trans-unit.source: If your application takes longer to start, the splash screen is closed once the main form becomes active.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式需要較長的時間啟動，啟動顯示畫面已關閉，一旦主要表單變為作用中。

trans-unit.source: When you add a splash screen to your application using the Project Designer, it sets the `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` property to 2000, giving a minimum display time of two seconds.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 專案設計工具的應用程式加入啟動顯示畫面時，它會設定`My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime`屬性為 2000，讓兩秒的最小的顯示時間。

trans-unit.source: This property supports the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] Application model.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性支援[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]應用程式模型。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: You should set the `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` property in a method that overrides the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnInitialize%2A> or <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateSplashScreen%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您應該設定`My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime`屬性會覆寫方法中的<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnInitialize%2A>或<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateSplashScreen%2A>方法。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateSplashScreen%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnInitialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Code that overrides methods of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase> class should be entered in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫方法的程式碼<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase>類別應該輸入在 ApplicationEvents.vb 檔案中，預設為隱藏。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase>

trans-unit.target: || |-| |若要存取程式碼編輯器視窗，覆寫成員 | |&1;。

trans-unit.source: With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
trans-unit.target: 在選取的專案**方案總管] 中**，按一下 [**屬性**上**專案**功能表。

trans-unit.source: 2. Click the **Application** tab.
trans-unit.target: 2.按一下**應用程式** 索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: 3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.
trans-unit.target: 3.按一下**檢視應用程式事件** 按鈕以開啟程式碼編輯器。

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[應用程式] 頁面上，[專案設計工具 (Visual Basic)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。 | # # 可用性專案類型 | | | |-|-| |專案類型 |可用 | |Windows Form 應用程式 |**Yes**| |類別庫 |否 | |主控台應用程式 |否 | |Windows Form 控制項程式庫 |否 | |Web 控制項程式庫 |否 | |Windows 服務 |否 | |網站 |否 |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The minimum length of time, in milliseconds, for which the splash screen is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 時間 （毫秒），啟動顯示畫面會顯示最小長度。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the network availability changes.
trans-unit.target: 網路的可用性變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: An application raises the `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event every time that the availability of the network changes.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式引發`NetworkAvailabilityChanged`事件每次變更網路的可用性。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs.IsNetworkAvailable%2A> property of the `e` parameter to get the new state of the network connection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs.IsNetworkAvailable%2A>屬性`e`參數，以取得新的網路連線狀態。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs.IsNetworkAvailable%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the current state of the network connection, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的網路連線的目前狀態，請使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>屬性。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised on the application's main thread with the other user-interface events.
trans-unit.target: 與其他使用者介面事件的應用程式的主執行緒上，會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: This enables the event handler to access directly the application's UI.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓事件處理常式，以直接存取應用程式的 UI。

trans-unit.source: However, if the application is busy handling another user-interface event when this event is raised, this event cannot be processed until the other event handler finishes or calls the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.DoEvents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果應用程式忙碌處理另一個使用者介面事件時都會引發這個事件，此事件無法處理直到完成其他事件處理常式，或呼叫<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.DoEvents%2A>方法。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.DoEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged> event provides the same functionality as this event but is available for all application types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged>事件提供相同的功能，因為此事件但為適用於所有應用程式類型。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged>

trans-unit.source: The code for the `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event handler is stored in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼`NetworkAvailabilityChanged`事件處理常式會儲存在 ApplicationEvents.vb 檔案中，預設為隱藏。

trans-unit.target: || |-| |若要存取的應用程式事件的程式碼編輯器視窗 | |&1;。

trans-unit.source: Have a project selected in **Solution Explorer.**
trans-unit.target: 在中選取專案**方案總管 中。**

trans-unit.source: Click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
trans-unit.target: 按一下**屬性**上**專案**功能表。

trans-unit.source: 2. Click the **Application** tab.
trans-unit.target: 2.按一下**應用程式** 索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: 3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.
trans-unit.target: 3.按一下**檢視應用程式事件** 按鈕以開啟程式碼編輯器。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).| > [!NOTE] > Many network hubs will provide a network connection even if the hub is disconnected from a larger network.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[應用程式] 頁面上，[專案設計工具 (Visual Basic)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。 | > [!NOTE] > 許多網路集線器會提供網路連線，即使較大的網路連線中斷的中樞。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, for wired connections, this event indicates change in the connection between the computer and a hub.
trans-unit.target: 因此，對於有線連線，此事件表示變更電腦與中心之間的連線。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event is not raised by applications when they are run on Windows 95 and Windows 98, or when they are run by a non-administrator on Windows 2000.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` Windows 95 及 Windows 98 上執行時，或由非系統管理員在 Windows 2000 上執行時，由應用程式不引發事件。

trans-unit.source: If your application might run on those operating systems, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> property to check for network availability.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式可能會執行這些作業系統上，使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>屬性來檢查網路可用性。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows a designer to emit code that configures the splash screen and main form.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫，可讓設計工具發出設定啟動顯示畫面和主要表單的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: By default, this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個方法沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: However, when you select a main form for your application in the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] **Project Designer**, the designer overrides this method with a method that sets the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm%2A> property to a new instance of the main form.
trans-unit.target: 不過，當您選取主表單中的應用程式[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]**專案設計工具**，設計工具會覆寫此方法時，設定方法<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm%2A>主要表單的新執行個體的屬性。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnRun%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnRun%2A>方法。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnRun%2A>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows a designer to emit code that initializes the splash screen.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，可讓設計工具發出初始化啟動顯示畫面的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: By default, this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個方法沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: If you select a splash screen for your application in the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] **Project Designer**, the designer overrides the OnCreateSplashScreen method with a method that sets the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.SplashScreen%2A> property to a new instance of the splash-screen form.
trans-unit.target: 如果您選取應用程式啟動顯示畫面[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]**專案設計工具**，設計工具覆寫 OnCreateSplashScreen 方法設定的方法與<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.SplashScreen%2A>啟動顯示畫面表單的新執行個體的屬性。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.SplashScreen%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnInitialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnInitialize%2A>方法。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnInitialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sets the visual styles, text display styles, and current principal for the main application thread (if the application uses Windows authentication), and initializes the splash screen, if defined.
trans-unit.target: 設定視覺化樣式、 文字顯示樣式和目前的主體，主應用程式的執行緒 （如果應用程式使用 Windows 驗證），並初始化啟動顯示畫面中，如果已定義。

trans-unit.source: By default, this method sets the visual styles, text display styles, and current principal for the main application thread (if the application uses Windows authentication), and calls `ShowSplashScreen` if neither `/nosplash` nor `-nosplash` is used as a command-line argument.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個方法會設定視覺化樣式、 文字顯示樣式和目前的主體，主應用程式的執行緒 （如果應用程式使用 Windows 驗證），並呼叫`ShowSplashScreen`如果既未`/nosplash`也`-nosplash`做為命令列引數。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the following methods: - <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.ShowSplashScreen%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫下列方法:- <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.ShowSplashScreen%2A>.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.ShowSplashScreen%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateSplashScreen%2A>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateSplashScreen%2A>.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateSplashScreen%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>, containing the command-line arguments as strings for the current application.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>的<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref>，包含命令列引數為目前的應用程式的字串。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> indicating if application startup should continue.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Boolean>指出應用程式啟動時應該繼續執行。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Provides the starting point for when the main application is ready to start running, after the initialization is done.
trans-unit.target: 主應用程式時即可開始執行初始設定完成之後提供的起點。

trans-unit.source: By default, before it enters the Windows Forms message loop, this method calls the `OnCreateMainForm` (to create the application's main form) and `HideSplashScreen` (to close the splash screen) methods: - <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateMainForm%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設之前它進入 Windows Form 訊息迴圈中，, 這個方法會呼叫`OnCreateMainForm`（要建立應用程式的主要表單） 和`HideSplashScreen`（若要關閉啟動顯示畫面） 方法:- <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateMainForm%2A>.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateMainForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: Provides a way for a designer to emit code that initializes the main form.
trans-unit.target: 提供方法，讓設計工具發出初始化主要表單的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: By default, this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個方法沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: However, when you select a main form for your application in the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] **Project Designer**, the designer overrides the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateMainForm%2A> method with a method that sets the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm%2A> property to a new instance of the main form.
trans-unit.target: 不過，當您選取主表單中的應用程式[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]**專案設計工具**，設計工具會覆寫<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateMainForm%2A>方法設定的方法與<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm%2A>主要表單的新執行個體的屬性。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateMainForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.HideSplashScreen%2A>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.HideSplashScreen%2A>.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.HideSplashScreen%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the application has a splash screen defined and it is open, this method closes the splash screen.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式具有定義的啟動顯示畫面，而其為開啟，這個方法會關閉在啟動顯示畫面。

trans-unit.source: By default, this method closes the splash screen.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個方法會關閉在啟動顯示畫面。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows for code to run when the application shuts down.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，允許應用程式關閉時執行的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: This method does not run if an unhandled exception occurs in the main application.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不會執行主應用程式中發生未處理例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: By default, this method raises the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Shutdown> event.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個方法會引發<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Shutdown>事件。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Shutdown>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows for code to run when the application starts.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，允許應用程式啟動時執行的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: By default, this method raises the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Startup> event.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個方法會引發<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Startup>事件。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Startup>

trans-unit.source: The event handler can set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the event argument.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式可以設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>事件引數的屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> is `True`, this method returns `False` to cancel the application startup.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>是`True`，這個方法會傳回`False`取消應用程式啟動。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method returns `True`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個方法會傳回`True`。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupEventArgs"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Contains the command-line arguments of the application and indicates whether the application startup should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 包含應用程式的命令列引數，並指出是否應取消應用程式啟動。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates if the application should continue starting up.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Boolean>指出是否應用程式應該繼續啟動。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows for code to run when a subsequent instance of a single-instance application starts.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫，可讓後續的執行個體的單一執行個體的應用程式啟動時執行的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: By default, this method raises the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.StartupNextInstance> event.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個方法會引發<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.StartupNextInstance>事件。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.StartupNextInstance>

trans-unit.source: The event handler can set the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs.BringToForeground%2A> property of the event argument.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式可以設定<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs.BringToForeground%2A>事件引數的屬性。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs.BringToForeground%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs.BringToForeground%2A> is `True`, the method activates the main form.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs.BringToForeground%2A>是`True`，方法會啟動主要表單。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs.BringToForeground%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the main form is left in its current state.
trans-unit.target: 否則，主要表單會處於目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Contains the command-line arguments of the subsequent application instance and indicates whether the first application instance should be brought to the foreground upon exiting the exception handler.
trans-unit.target: 包含命令列引數，後續的應用程式執行個體，並指出第一個應用程式執行個體是否應移到結束的例外狀況處理常式時前景。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows for code to run when an unhandled exception occurs in the application.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，允許應用程式中發生未處理的例外狀況時執行的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: By default, this method raises the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException> event as long as a debugger is not attached and the user is handling the `UnhandledException` event.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個方法會引發<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException>只要偵錯工具未附加，而且使用者正在處理的事件`UnhandledException`事件。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException>

trans-unit.source: The event handler can set the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式可以設定<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A>屬性。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A> is `False`, or if the event is not handled, the application exits upon return from the exception handler.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A>是`False`，或如果未處理的事件，應用程式結束時傳回的例外狀況處理常式。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, control of the application is returned to the Windows Forms message loop.
trans-unit.target: 否則，控制應用程式會傳回至 Windows Form 訊息迴圈。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException"></xref> event was raised.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Boolean>，指出是否<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException"></xref>引發事件。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all the application's open forms.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合中的應用程式的所有開啟表單。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.OpenForms` property gets a collection of all the application's open forms.
trans-unit.target: `My.Application.OpenForms`屬性會取得之應用程式的所有開啟表單的集合。

trans-unit.source: The behavior is identical to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.OpenForms%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 行為等同於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.OpenForms%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.OpenForms%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `My.Application.OpenForms` property returns all open forms, regardless of which thread opened them.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`My.Application.OpenForms`屬性會傳回所有開啟表單中，不論哪一個執行緒的開啟它們。

trans-unit.source: You should check the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A> property of each form before accessing it; otherwise, it might throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 您應該檢查<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>屬性的每個表單之前存取它; 否則它可能會擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>例外狀況。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sets up and starts the Visual Basic Application model.
trans-unit.target: 設定並啟動 Visual Basic 應用程式模型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the application saves the user settings on exit.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否應用程式在結束時儲存使用者設定。

trans-unit.source: The `SaveMySettingsOnExit` property allows the user to change how the application saves settings, at run time.
trans-unit.target: `SaveMySettingsOnExit`屬性可讓使用者變更應用程式在執行階段所儲存的設定。

trans-unit.source: You can explicitly save setting changes by using the <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.Save%2A> method of the `My.Settings` object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用，以明確地儲存設定變更<xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.Save%2A>方法`My.Settings`物件。</xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about changing and saving settings, see [Application Properties](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關變更並儲存設定的詳細資訊，請參閱[應用程式屬性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The changes to this property are not persisted when the application closes.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式關閉時，不會保存此屬性的變更。

trans-unit.source: To change the `SaveMySettingsOnExit` property permanently, you must change the setting in the **Project Designer**: || |-| |To change the setting in the Project Designer| |1.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更`SaveMySettingsOnExit`屬性永久，您必須變更設定中的**專案設計工具**: | | |-| |若要變更 專案設計工具中的設定 | |&1;。

trans-unit.source: Have a project selected in **Solution Explorer**.
trans-unit.target: 在中選取專案**方案總管 中**。

trans-unit.source: Click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
trans-unit.target: 按一下**屬性**上**專案**功能表。

trans-unit.source: 2. Click the **Application** tab.
trans-unit.target: 2.按一下**應用程式** 索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> indicates that the application saves the user settings on exit.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>指出應用程式儲存使用者設定，在結束。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the settings are not implicitly saved.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the application has a splash screen defined, and if it does, displays it.
trans-unit.target: 決定應用程式是否有定義，啟動顯示畫面中，若是如此，顯示。

trans-unit.source: By default, this method calls `OnCreateSplashScreen` in a thread-safe way.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個方法會呼叫`OnCreateSplashScreen`執行緒安全的方式。

trans-unit.source: The ShowSplashScreen method contains the code that displays the splash screen for at least the number of milliseconds specified by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ShowSplashScreen 方法包含的程式碼會顯示啟動顯示畫面上的最小的所指定的毫秒數<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime%2A>屬性。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: To use this functionality, you must set the `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` property in a method that overrides the ShowSplashScreen or <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateSplashScreen%2A> method, or add the splash screen to your application using the **Project Designer**.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用這項功能，您必須設定`My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime`ShowSplashScreen 會覆寫方法中的屬性或<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateSplashScreen%2A>方法，或新增到您的應用程式使用的啟動顯示畫面**專案設計工具**。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnCreateSplashScreen%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime%2A>.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnInitialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnInitialize%2A>方法。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnInitialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the application shuts down.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式關閉時發生。

trans-unit.source: An application raises the `Shutdown` event before it exits.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式引發`Shutdown`結束前的事件。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to control how the application closes its resources.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您控制如何在應用程式關閉其資源。

trans-unit.source: This event is part of the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] Application model.
trans-unit.target: 此事件是屬於[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]應用程式模型。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The code for the `Shutdown` event handler is stored in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼`Shutdown`事件處理常式會儲存在 ApplicationEvents.vb 檔案中，預設為隱藏。

trans-unit.source: Determines what happens when the application's main form closes.
trans-unit.target: 判斷應用程式的主要表單關閉時，會發生什麼事。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.OnMainFormClosed%2A> method checks the value of this property to determine if the application should shut down when the main form is closed, or if another open form should be promoted as the new main form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.OnMainFormClosed%2A>方法會檢查這個屬性來判斷是否應用程式應該關閉時，主要表單關閉時，或是如果另一個開啟表單應該升級為新的主要表單的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.OnMainFormClosed%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ShutdownMode"></xref> enumeration value, indicating what the application should do when the main form closes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ShutdownMode"> </xref>列舉值，指出應用程式應該怎麼主要表單關閉時。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the splash screen for this application.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此應用程式啟動顯示畫面。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.SplashScreen` property allows you to get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> object that the application uses as the splash screen, the first graphic form that is displayed while an application is being started.
trans-unit.target: `My.Application.SplashScreen`屬性可讓您取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>應用程式當做啟動顯示畫面使用的物件、 應用程式正在啟動時，會顯示第一個圖形形式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: This property supports the Visual Basic Application model.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性支援 Visual Basic 應用程式模型。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The changes to this property are not persisted when the application closes.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式關閉時，不會保存此屬性的變更。

trans-unit.source: To change the splash screen permanently, you must change the setting in the **Project Designer**.
trans-unit.target: 若要永久變更啟動顯示畫面，您必須變更中的設定**專案設計工具**。

trans-unit.source: Availability by Project Type ||| |-|-| |Project type|Available| |Windows Forms Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|No| |Console Application|No| |Windows Forms Control Library|No| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|No| |Web Site|No|
trans-unit.target: 專案類型的可用性 | | | |-|-| |專案類型 |可用 | |Windows Form 應用程式 |**Yes**| |類別庫 |否 | |主控台應用程式 |否 | |Windows Form 控制項程式庫 |否 | |Web 控制項程式庫 |否 | |Windows 服務 |否 | |網站 |否 |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> object that the application uses as the splash screen.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref>應用程式當做啟動顯示畫面使用的物件。

trans-unit.source: The same value is assigned to this property and the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm*> property.
trans-unit.target: 相同的值指派給這個屬性與<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm*>屬性。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the application starts.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式啟動時，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: A normal (non-single-instance) application raises the `Startup` event every time it starts.
trans-unit.target: 一般 （非單一的執行個體） 應用程式引發`Startup`每次啟動的事件。

trans-unit.source: A single-instance application raises the `Startup` event when it starts only if the application is not already active; otherwise, it raises the `StartupNextInstance` event.
trans-unit.target: 單一執行個體的應用程式引發`Startup`事件時啟動僅如果應用程式尚未使用中; 否則便會產生`StartupNextInstance`事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.StartupNextInstance>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.StartupNextInstance>.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.StartupNextInstance>

trans-unit.source: This event is part of the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] Application model.
trans-unit.target: 此事件是屬於[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]應用程式模型。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the `e` parameter to control the loading of an application's startup form.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`e`參數來控制應用程式的啟動表單的載入。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property is set to `True`, the startup form does not start.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性設定為`True`，啟動表單不會啟動。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: In that case, your code should call an alternate startup code path.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您的程式碼應該呼叫替代啟動程式碼路徑。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupEventArgs.CommandLine%2A> property of the `e` parameter or the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.CommandLineArgs%2A> property to access the application's command-line arguments.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupEventArgs.CommandLine%2A>屬性`e`參數或<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.CommandLineArgs%2A>屬性來存取應用程式的命令列引數。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase.CommandLineArgs%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupEventArgs.CommandLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: The code for the `Startup` event handler is stored in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼`Startup`事件處理常式會儲存在 ApplicationEvents.vb 檔案中，預設為隱藏。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when attempting to start a single-instance application and the application is already active.
trans-unit.target: 發生於嘗試啟動單一執行個體的應用程式和應用程式已在使用中。

trans-unit.source: A single-instance application raises the StartupNextInstance event when you attempt to restart the application when it is already active.
trans-unit.target: 單一執行個體的應用程式時，引發 StartupNextInstance 事件您嘗試重新啟動應用程式時已在使用中。

trans-unit.source: When a single-instance application starts for the first time, it raises the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Startup> event.
trans-unit.target: 當單一執行個體的應用程式第一次啟動時，會引發<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Startup>事件。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Startup>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Startup>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Startup>.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.Startup>

trans-unit.source: This event is part of the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] Application model.
trans-unit.target: 此事件是屬於[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]應用程式模型。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised on the application's main thread with the other user-interface events.
trans-unit.target: 與其他使用者介面事件的應用程式的主執行緒上，會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: This allows the event handler to access directly the application's user interface.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓應用程式的使用者介面直接存取此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: However, if the application is busy handling another user-interface event when this event is raised, this event cannot be processed until the other event handler finishes or calls the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.DoEvents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果應用程式忙碌處理另一個使用者介面事件時都會引發這個事件，此事件無法處理直到完成其他事件處理常式，或呼叫<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.DoEvents%2A>方法。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.DoEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `StartupNextInstance` event is raised only in single-instance applications.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`StartupNextInstance`只能在單一執行個體的應用程式中引發事件。

trans-unit.source: To enable single-instance behavior for your application, you must check the **Make single instance application** check box in the Project Designer.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用您的應用程式的單一執行個體行為，您必須檢查**讓單一執行個體的應用程式**專案設計工具中的核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the application encounters an unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: 發生於應用程式遇到未處理的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: An application raises the `UnhandledException` event when it encounters an unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式引發`UnhandledException`時遇到未處理的例外狀況的事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is part of the Visual Basic Application model.
trans-unit.target: 此事件是在 Visual Basic 應用程式模型的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadExceptionEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the `e` parameter to access the unhandled exception that caused this event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Threading.ThreadExceptionEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性`e`存取導致此事件的未處理例外狀況的參數。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadExceptionEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A> property of the `e` parameter to control whether the application exits.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A>屬性`e`參數來控制是否在應用程式結束。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A> is `True`.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A>是`True`。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the application exits after completing the `UnhandledException` event handler.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在應用程式結束後完成`UnhandledException`事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: You can set the value to `False` in the `UnhandledException` event handler to keep the application running, and have it return to a waiting state.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將值設定為`False`中`UnhandledException`事件處理常式，以保留應用程式執行，並讓它回到等候狀態。

trans-unit.source: The code for the `UnhandledException` event handler is stored in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼`UnhandledException`事件處理常式會儲存在 ApplicationEvents.vb 檔案中，預設為隱藏。

trans-unit.source: || |-| |To access the Code Editor window for application events| |1.
trans-unit.target: || |-| |若要存取的應用程式事件的程式碼編輯器視窗 | |&1;。

trans-unit.source: With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
trans-unit.target: 在選取的專案**方案總管] 中**，按一下 [**屬性**上**專案**功能表。

trans-unit.source: 2. Click the **Application** tab.
trans-unit.target: 2.按一下**應用程式** 索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: 3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.| For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 3.按一下**檢視應用程式事件** 按鈕以開啟程式碼編輯器。 | 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[應用程式] 頁面上，[專案設計工具 (Visual Basic)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Visual Basic compiler prevents applications that are built for debugging from raising this event, to enable a debugger to handle the unhandled exceptions.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic 編譯器會防止建立無法引發此事件，以啟用偵錯工具來處理未處理的例外狀況偵錯的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: This means that if you are testing your application by running it under the Visual Studio Integrated Development Environment debugger, your `UnhandledException` event handler will not be called.
trans-unit.target: 這表示，如果您要測試您的應用程式藉由執行在 Visual Studio 整合式開發環境偵錯工具中，您`UnhandledException`將不會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about building applications for debugging, see [/debug (Visual Basic)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需建置應用程式進行偵錯的詳細資訊，請參閱[/debug (Visual Basic)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 下表列出包含工作的範例工作`My.Application.UnhandledException`事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, this property allows a designer to specify the default text rendering engine for the application's forms.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫，則這個屬性允許指定應用程式的表單的預設文字轉譯引擎的設計工具。

trans-unit.source: By default, this property returns `False` to indicate that the GDI text rendering engine for [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/add/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)] be used for the application's forms.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個屬性會傳回`False`表示轉譯引擎的 GDI 文字[!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/add/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)]用於應用程式的表單。

trans-unit.source: However, you can override this property to return `True` and specify that the application's forms use the GDI+ text rendering engine, which is used in Visual Basic .NET 2002 and Visual Basic .NET 2003.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以覆寫此屬性以傳回`True`並指定應用程式的表單使用 GDI + 文字轉譯引擎，使用 Visual Basic.NET 2002年和 Visual Basic.NET 2003年中。

trans-unit.source: This property is called by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性由呼叫<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase>建構函式。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase>

trans-unit.source: Code that overrides methods of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase> class should be entered in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫方法的程式碼<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase>類別應該輸入在 ApplicationEvents.vb 檔案中，預設為隱藏。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase>

trans-unit.source: || |-| |To access the Code Editor window for overriding members| |1.
trans-unit.target: || |-| |若要存取程式碼編輯器視窗，覆寫成員 | |&1;。

trans-unit.source: With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
trans-unit.target: 在選取的專案**方案總管] 中**，按一下 [**屬性**上**專案**功能表。

trans-unit.source: 2. Click the **Application** tab.
trans-unit.target: 2.按一下**應用程式** 索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: 3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.
trans-unit.target: 3.按一下**檢視應用程式事件** 按鈕以開啟程式碼編輯器。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).|
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[應用程式] 頁面上，[專案設計工具 (Visual Basic)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。 |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref> indicates that the application should use the default text rendering engine for [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/add/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 值為<xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>指出應用程式應該使用的預設文字轉譯引擎[!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/add/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> indicates that the application should use the text rendering engine for Visual Basic .NET 2002 and Visual Basic .NET 2003.
trans-unit.target: 值為<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>表示應用程式應該使用 Visual Basic.NET 2002年和 Visual Basic.NET 2003年中的文字轉換引擎。
